line_1: Make coffee, when my lady calls, or whey,
line_2: And fetch, and carry, like a two-leg'd tray;

line_1: And snow-white curd abounds, and wholesome whey.
line_2: Streams of new milk through flowing coolers stray,

line_1: From the white Curds extracts the greener Whey,
line_2: Nor dreams of Fashion, Poetry, or Play;

line_1: To see her milk all turn'd to whey?
line_2: What will poor Gooddy Baucis say,
